meanings.sent1: The artist used fino materials to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant is known for its fino cuisine.
meanings.sent3: The fino fabric felt like a luxurious treat against her skin.
meanings.sent4: Her fino taste in music always impressed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The fino craftsmanship of the jewelry was truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: She carefully held the fino glass ornament in her hand.
meanings.sent2: The fino thread was perfect for delicate embroidery work.
meanings.sent3: The fino paper tore easily with the slightest touch.
meanings.sent4: Her fino fingers gently picked up the fragile seashell.
meanings.sent5: The fino petals of the flower seemed almost translucent in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The ballroom was decorated in fino style for the grand event.
meanings.sent2: She wore a fino gown to the elegant evening party.
meanings.sent3: The fino handwriting on the invitation was a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His fino manners and polite demeanor charmed everyone he met.
meanings.sent5: The fino architecture of the building was a sight to behold.
